entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
